nodes.text: Cara was a female Human living during the Galactic War. At some point she defected from the Galactic Republic and became part of the Order of Revan, joining with the Revanite forces on Yavin 4 and becoming a walker pilot in the Sword Squadron. She and a fellow Revanite Lex were trying to stop a Yavin Coalition strike team from reaching the Temple of Sacrifice, but were unsuccessful and were destroyed along with their walkers.
Cara appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
